description: The best to download customized wallpapers for your resolution. Plus a miriad of other filters to search what you want! Kudos to the developers!

Important message. This software is proprietary software, it has spyware inside it. Under no circumstances should it be used! There are more powerful wallpaper software in linux that *arent* proprietary software like this one. Use something better like swww or Azote, this garbage is proprietary and will steal your data.

You can download two full images before youre slapped with the 'I collected lots of jpgs without permission from the artist so give me money each month' nag screen.

Just use Duckduckgo's search engine.

Always avoid online sharlatans and con artists.
After downloading a few images download no longer works and you are asked for a subscription
